Constructor Detail

Star

public Star(float xCenter,
            float yCenter,
            float innerRadius,
            float outerRadius,
            int numSides)
Creates a new star taking in the center x/y positions, the inner/outer radius and number of sides.

Parameters:
xCenter - The center x position.
yCenter - The center y position.
innerRadius - The inner radius of the star.
outerRadius - The outer radius of the star.
numSides - The number of sides on the star.

            float yCenter,

            int numSides)
Creates a new star taking in the center x/y positions, the x/y inner/outer radius and number of sides.

Parameters:
xCenter - The center x position.
yCenter - The center y position.
innerXRadius - The inner x radius of the star.
innerYRadius - The inner y radius of the star.
outerXRadius - The outer x radius of the star.
outerYRadius - The outer y radius of the star.
numSides - The number of sides on the star.
